TopicTitle: A very special gift from Shapeways! (Ended)

Articles.Content: Just entered mine. And as asked, I was very specific, up to the particular Supercluster the other humans are ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Entered! So want to have a Jeb on my desk ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> We delete any double entries ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Darn, did you delete both or just the other one?
Entered! In a name of Space Craken!
Good luck everyone been planning on buying one of these but I'll wait and see if I win it first even if I do I'll probably buy another one soon......
In the morning, they will have huge DB with forum names, IPs, machine footprints AND real addresses. Good job. For mere Eur30.
I'll eventually buy one anyway, but free giveaways are always fine by me! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> In the morning, they will have huge DB with forum names, IPs, machine footprints AND real addresses. Good job. For mere Eur30.

We have a huge database of forum names & corresponding IP addresses on the forums already - and we'll only ask for the physical address of the winner, because we need to send over the prize somehow ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Im entered! 

On a Side note: Id REALLY REALLY like to know if Shapeways has any plays to make a Val Figurine! I have the Original 3, and would love to add a Val to the shelf!

I said "Narnia."

#HopeI'mRight
I feel like I got the first question wrong?
Good luck with the contest guys!

Since I already have all the figures (and they're EXCELLENT) I'll give someone else the chance. I am glad to see Shapeways being part of things.

And yes, I want to throw a vote in for a Val figure too, please.
According to my calculations there are 99.9999999158% of humans living on earth right now.
Took me a few moments to work out the answer.
I put under ground. Cause it said on the earth nothing about under it. I think I'm right not sure though.
I hope I'm the lucky one... Either way good luck to everyone else! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I hope I'm the lucky one... Either way good luck to everyone else! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Same to you, good sir!

(I just need five posts ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))
Just Entered, gl to everyone
I'm in! Let's hope I can win. Good luck everyone!
Man I so want one of those little guys. The hard part would be deciding which.
I Already have the IVA set of Jeb, Bob and Bill. Just ordered a Stargazing - Small to take to work and Werner von Kerman. Really looking forward to adding Valentina to my collection some day.
I love the stuff that Shapeways makes! Great to see them taking part in the release party!
Entered. If I win, I'll probably get the ground crew - it's one of the cheaper ones, but it made me laugh out loud when I saw it.

I would love to have a Shapeways model but can't afford it due to economic slump. Thankfully I have KSP to save money with (don't need new games) and an awesome new job but in the meantime, I sent out my entry :3
